data.title: William Butler Yeats – Documentary
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature 1923 was awarded to William Butler Yeats "for his always inspired poetry, which in a highly artistic form gives expression to the spirit of a whole nation"
data.text:
William Butler Yeats

Documentary

Your browser does not support the video tag.

A short clip of Nobel Laureate in Literature William Butler Yeats when he arrived at the Central Station in Stockholm for the Nobel Prize Award Ceremony held on 10 December 1923.

From SF Veckorevy 1923-12-10.

To cite this section
